item.title: The Epistemology of Testimony
item.author: ck_howard@yahoo.com (Chris Howard)
item.description: The Epistemology of Testimony As humans, our primary way of learning about the world is through experience. But given that we aren’t omnipresent and can’t experience everything for ourselves, we have to fall back on another methodâ€”teamwork. We create information and share it with others, and they do the same. Pretty much everything we learn about the world, apart from what we learn through observation and experience, is based on testimony, or what we hear and read.
